text:
Nocino (Napolitano)
1 kg green walnuts
1 litre alcohol
a handful of rose petals
2-3 chopped rose hips
2 tsp vanilla essence
3 cloves
1/2 tsp cinnamon
sugar syrup (3 cups sugar, 1 cup water)
Quarter the nuts and place in a large jar with a lid. Add all the other ingredients except sugar syrup, close and macerate in a warm place for 1-2 months. Strain and add sugar syrup. Bottle. Store in a dark place.
weighed this just now: I have ~52lbs of walnuts
